reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Watson is an amazing professor! Her lectures are clear, and she is always willing to help outside of class.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Miller explains concepts well, but his exams can be challenging. Be prepared to study hard.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Lee knows her material, but her teaching style is a bit dry. Labs are very informative though.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Prof. Brown is knowledgeable, but his lectures are disorganized and hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Carter is passionate about biology and makes the classes engaging. The workload is manageable.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson is the best! He makes literature come alive and provides great feedback on essays.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson has a deep understanding of history, but her lectures can be monotonous.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Moore encourages critical thinking and class discussions, but the readings are heavy.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is inspiring! She connects sociological theories to real-world examples effectively.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor's lectures are difficult to understand, and he doesn't provide much help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is very knowledgeable and provides detailed feedback on assignments, but her exams are tough.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Prof. Adams is decent, but his lectures are sometimes confusing and hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson is fantastic! He is passionate about the environment and makes the subject very interesting.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez is very knowledgeable, and her classes are enjoyable, but there's a lot of reading required.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez's lectures are hard to follow, and he doesn't provide enough examples for complex topics.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Green is amazing! She makes music theory easy to understand and is always supportive.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Harris knows his stuff, but his lectures are too fast-paced and hard to keep up with.

reviews.subject: Business
reviews.review: Prof. Lewis is great! She brings real-world business experience to the classroom, but her assignments can be tough.

reviews.subject: Law
reviews.review: Dr. Young's lectures are dry, and he doesn't engage much with students. The material is also very dense.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Prof. White is incredible! She makes anthropology fascinating and always encourages student participation.
